name: PAT_INDICATOR
description: The PAT_INDICATOR table contains information about your patient genomic indicator records. These include disease-related and drug-related genomic indicators linked to patients.

columns.name: PAT_INDICATOR_ID
columns.description: This column contains the unique identifier (.1 item) for the pt indicators record.

columns.name: GENOMIC_INDICATR_ID
columns.description: This column contains the Genomic Indicator linked to this record.

columns.name: GENOMIC_INDICATR_ID_RESOLVED_PAT_FRIENDLY_NAME
columns.description: This column provides an always populated name column that prioritizes the patient friendly name and if there is none specified, falls back to the clinical name.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The column contains the unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: OVERVIEW_NOTE_ID
columns.description: This column contains the overview note for the genomic indicator as linked to the patient. Patient-specific details about the genomic indicator are stored in the note networked to this item.

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DT
columns.description: This column contains the date the record was created.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_UPD_DTTM
columns.description: This column contains the instant the record was last locked/unlocked.

columns.name: CREATION_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The creation source for this patient genomic indicator. Blank values are treated as manually created indicators by the translation engine.
